mainSequence.step: Entrant attends event by sending an Attend Event Request to Ticket.
Ticket receives the Attend Event Request and activates.
Ticket sends a Create Member Request to Member.
Member receives the Create Member Request and activates.
Member sends a Create Member Response to Ticket.
Ticket receives the Create Member Response and deactivates Member.
Ticket sends an Attend Event Response to Entrant.
Entrant receives the Attend Event Response and deactivates Ticket.
